content.question: Which of the following actions is most likely to reduce the degree of income inequality within a society?

choices.label: Lowering the tax rate on income from savings
Increasing the cost to households of primary and secondary education
Introducing progressive inheritance taxes on accumulated wealth

content.answer: Introducing progressive inheritance taxes on accumulated wealth
